name: The Bomb That Brings Us Together
name_original: The Bomb That Brings Us Together
description:
Features

  • Watercolors!
  • Bombs!
  • Ragtime!
  • Elbow-rubbing keyboard coop! (Gamepad works too)
  • Wonky Unity Physics!
  • SHORT

The Game

You control Slick and Hefty, two chain gang brothers on the run. Slick’s the dexterous one, Hefty’s the muscle. Both like to think of themselves as the brain of the operation (neither are). For complicated reasons their ball chain is – unfortunately – a bomb that starts burning whenever it touches the ground. You’ll have to navigate them safely to Mexico without the bomb blowing up in your face. Good luck!  

Gameplay

One player controls Slick, the other Hefty. A single player can control both to proof their ambidextrous abilities. You can move, jump and pick up / throw the bomb. The bomb will light the fuse whenever isn’t carried and explode after a few seconds. Slick can jump higher but does not fit through all passages (tall people don’t duck). He’s also fairly weak. Hefty is strong enough to carry and throw the bomb without issues but can’t jump as high. Navigate the jumping-puzzles on your way to freedom!  

Controls

Keybindings are explained in-game. You can play the game with up to two gamepads. If no gamepads are connected, players rub elbows on a single keyboard. Gamepads are only recognized on startup!  

The story so far

Slick and Hefty knew their plan was foolproof: 1. Disguise a bomb as ball chain 2. Smuggle it into the prison 3. Blow up the walls 4. Freedom awaits! Or rather, awaited. What they didn’t expect was to be chained to the exact same bomb and be sent off to chain gang duty. But if Slicky and Hefty know one thing it’s improvisation and running away. And now they are indeed on the run, chained to each other and the temperamental bomb that brings them together. Onwards, to Mexico!

Credits

The Bomb That Brings Us Together was made by Anna, Arne and Markus.

Music: Bohemia Rag by Joseph Lamp.

Shoutout to IFGameSH & all participants of the parallel running SummerJam 2021.
